Source.Name: rocm-hipcc
Source.Summary: HIP compiler driver (Don't install, this is for building only)
Source.Description: (Don't install, this is for building only) hipcc is a compiler driver utility that will call clang or nvcc, depending on target, and pass the appropriate include and library options for the target compiler and HIP infrastructure.

Package.Name: rocm-hipcc
Package.Summary: HIP compiler driver (Don't install, this is for building only)
Package.Description: (Don't install, this is for building only) hipcc is a compiler driver utility that will call clang or nvcc, depending on target, and pass the appropriate include and library options for the target compiler and HIP infrastructure.
